member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Entities.Groups.Content.CreateContentItem(DotNetNuke.Security.Roles.RoleInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: This should only run after the Post exists in the data store.
member.returns: The newly created ContentItemID from the data store.
member.remarks: This is for the first question in the thread. Not for replies or items with ParentID > 0.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Entities.Groups.Content.UpdateContentItem(DotNetNuke.Security.Roles.RoleInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is used to update the content in the ContentItems table. Should be called when a question is updated.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Entities.Groups.Content.DeleteContentItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: This removes a content item associated with a question/thread from the data store. Should run every time an entire thread is deleted.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Entities.Groups.Content.GetContentTypeID(System.String)
member.summary: This is used to determine the ContentTypeID (part of the Core API) based on this module's content type. If the content type doesn't exist yet for the module, it is created.
member.returns: The primary key value (ContentTypeID) from the core API's Content Types table.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Entities.Groups.Content.CreateContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Content Type (for taxonomy) in the data store.
member.returns: The primary key value of the new ContentType.
